name: Serta_RTA_Natori_Collection_Tahara_Beige_73-inch_Sofa_
description: This Serta sofa is classically styled with soft rounded arms and straight cushions for a refined look that pairs seamlessly with another sofa or loveseat from the Natori Collection. It comes with two reversible accent pillows, one side a zig-zag print and the other side Tahara beige for a versatile finishing touch. Made with the Serta legacy of quality, comfort and style, the Serta RTA Natori Collection Sofa blends function and style. With its smaller design and easy assembly, this apartment-sized sofa is a great way to add comfortable seating when you have limited space.Stylish and affordable solution to compliment smaller spacesRounded arms and plush fabric create a classic look that will complement any roomSturdy design supported with quality hardwood materials, foam, individually wrapped coil seating, and pillowed back cushions to provide superior comfortQuick tool-free assembly and one-box packing fits through narrow doorways and stairwells on moving dayEspresso finished wood legs provide durability and stabilityReinforced hardwood material frame for strength and durabilityPremium S-coil for extra supportLoose pillowed back cushions feature a poly-fiber core and non-woven cover that retains shape and density for lasting comfortSolid steel fastening hardware is durable and long-lastingPairs with additional Serta Natori pieces sold separatelySet includes: One (1) sofa and two (2) reversible accent pillowsMaterials: Polyester fabric, wood, foamFinish: EspressoUpholstery color: Tahara BeigeUpholstery fill: FoamWeight: 101.2 poundsSeat dimensions: 20 inches high x 57.5 inches wide x 20.5 inches deepDimensions: 35 inches high x 73 inches wide x 32.5 inches deepFurniture Pattern: SolidType: SofaMaterial: Foam, Metal, Polyester, Plastic, WoodStyle: Modern, ContemporaryAssembly: Assembly RequiredExact Color: BeigeColor: BeigeStyleContemporary, ModernMaterialFoam, Metal, Plastic, Polyester, WoodTypeSofaAssemblyAssembly RequiredColorBeigeFurniture PatternSolid
